author: FE Online
title: Malayalam actress molestation case: Shocking twist to the tale! Did a woman mastermind the abduction?
text:
Malayalam actress molestation case: Shocking twist to the tale! Did a woman mastermind the abduction? Malayalam actress molestation case: Shocking twist to the tale! Did a woman mastermind the abduction? Till now, most local TV news reports had referred to the involvement of a leading actor but there seems to be a shocking twist to this tale now! By: FE Online | Published: February 23, 2017 1:10 PM According to a report by Manorama News, which is based on the statement of Manikandan the fourth accused in this case, a woman gave the quotation for the abduction and molestation of the actress! 
Till now, most local TV news reports had referred to the involvement of a leading actor but there seems to be a shocking twist to this tale now! 
According to a report by Manorama News, which is based on the statement of Manikandan the fourth accused in this case, a woman gave the quotation for the abduction and molestation of the actress! 
Local TV reports had continuously raised doubts about the genuineness of Manikandan’s statement to the police as there were several discrepancies in it as compared to the others who have been arrested in the same case. 
The most shocking twist has come with this revelation by Manikandan – that he heard Pulsar Sunil informing the actress that it was a woman who has given the quotation for her abduction.
